overview:
For almost a decade, Gerald supported start-ups in the process of developing their corporate identity. He helped them to discover, visualize and articulate the meaning of their products.

He also designed interactive exhibitions for the Austrian Parliament and Federal Ministry of Agriculture, supported Red Bull in developing the visual foundations of Servus TV, and backed some of Austria’s biggest advertising agencies as a consultant for multimedia projects.

Since 2011, he has been putting his lifeblood into a new and meaningful start-up: mySugr, eating diabetes.
